subject: 3 DAY LIVE EVENT - starts today Sept 18th Keith Age, Dave and Tom Jones and many more
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
--0-745678668-1253273985=:2391
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1

Ok guys I said I would try and give you guys a heads up since many of you e=
njoyed the past live events on PTN so here ya go. Paranormal Television Net=
work is broadcasting another live event this weekend September 18th - 20th.=
 
=A0

www.paranormaltvnetwork.com
or
www.paranormaltelevisionnetwork.com
=
=A0
It will be free to watch and participate in the interactive chat. For m=
ore info you can check out www.octagonhall.com. Afternoon activities=A0incl=
ude many guest speakers on a variety of subjects, re-enactors, living histo=
ry demo's, live cannon fire, raffles, contests, and music along with other =
activities. And yes they will be having a ghosthunt at night there as well =
for those who are interested in the paranormal side of the location.=A0
=A0=

Guest speakers at the Octagon Hall commemoration will include Bryan Bush, =
Dr. Ron Hatcher, Dr. Michael Trapasso, Paul Browning, Keith Age, Chris Dedm=
an,=A0and Rhiannon Waits. Paul Browning has written a book entitled Hauntin=
gs at Octagon Hall. Dave and Tom Jones Para-X Radio CBS=A0Psychiconair=A0Cl=
arksville Ghost Hunters and a few surprise guests.
=A0
GHOST HUNTERS WILL E=
NCOUNTER
CIVIL WAR RE-ENACTORS SEPT. 18-20
AS OCTAGON HALL MARKS 150 YEARS
=

Franklin, Ky. -- Octagon Hall, an eight-sided brick antebellum home in Fra=
nklin, Ky., is observing the 150th anniversary of its completion. A three-d=
ay celebration Sept. 18, 19, and 20 will feature Civil War re-enactors and =
historians alongside paranormal investigators and ghost hunters.
=A0

=A0
L=
ooks like another fun weekend event fundraiser to help with restoration of =
a historic landmark. If you cant make it out to the location then come join=
 in watching it LIVE for free.
=A0
Have a great day!
Misty
